results.title: Puzzling painful nodules on back: a case report
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was prescribed oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ 10 mg once a day for symptomatic relief of @<m>DISEASE_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@pain@@@ and @DISEASE_Myalgia @DISEASE_MESH:D063806 @@@tenderness@@@.

citations.NLM: Pendam M, Madke B, Ganjre S, Chandak M, Singh AL. Puzzling painful nodules on back: a case report Pan Afr Med J. 2022;42():203. PMID: 36284576
citations.BibTeX: @article{36284576, title={Puzzling painful nodules on back: a case report}, author={Pendam M and Madke B and Ganjre S and Chandak M and Singh AL}, journal={Pan Afr Med J}, volume={42}, pages={203}}

results.title: Amlodipine-Induced Liver Injury
results.text_hl: After about two weeks of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ therapy, she developed intermittent @<m>DISEASE_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@right upper quadrant pain@@@ as well as @DISEASE_Pruritus @DISEASE_MESH:D011537 @@@pruritus@@@ which continued for a few days before she presented to medical attention.

citations.NLM: Yet Kwong Horman J, Patel P, Schultz M, Kraschnewski J. Amlodipine-Induced Liver Injury Cureus. 2022 Mar;14(3):e23441. PMID: 35481325
citations.BibTeX: @article{35481325, title={Amlodipine-Induced Liver Injury}, author={Yet Kwong Horman J and Patel P and Schultz M and Kraschnewski J}, journal={Cureus}, volume={14}, number={3}, pages={e23441}}

results.title: Fixed-dose combination amlodipine-celecoxib for treatment of hypertension and osteoarthritis pain: an up-to-date evaluation.
results.text_hl: Fixed-dose combination @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@-@CHEMICAL_Celecoxib @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068579 @@@celecoxib@@@ for treatment of @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@osteoarthritis pain@@@: an up-to-date evaluation.

citations.NLM: Piszczatoski CR, Smith SM. Fixed-dose combination amlodipine-celecoxib for treatment of hypertension and osteoarthritis pain: an up-to-date evaluation. Expert Opin Pharmacother. 2021 Aug;22(11):1381-1385. PMID: 33938788
citations.BibTeX: @article{33938788, title={Fixed-dose combination amlodipine-celecoxib for treatment of hypertension and osteoarthritis pain: an up-to-date evaluation.}, author={Piszczatoski CR and Smith SM}, journal={Expert Opin Pharmacother}, volume={22}, number={11}, pages={1381-1385}}

results.title: Necrotizing Ulcerative Gingivitis, a Rare Manifestation as a Sequel of Drug-Induced Gingival Overgrowth: A Case Report
results.text_hl: The purpose of this case report is to present a rare case of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@-induced @DISEASE_Gingival_Overgrowth @DISEASE_MESH:D019214 @@@gingival overgrowth@@@ with a secondary formation of necrotizing @DISEASE_Gingivitis_Necrotizing_Ulcerative @DISEASE_MESH:D005892 @@@ulcerative gingivitis@@@ involving the upper and lower arches of a 68-year-old female @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ with a chief complaint of "@DISEASE_Oculodental_syndrome_Rutherfurd_syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:C537732 @@@swollen gums@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@pain on mastication@@@ which has been recurring for the past 5 years."

citations.NLM: Damdoum M, Varma SR, Jaber MA, Nambiar M. Necrotizing Ulcerative Gingivitis, a Rare Manifestation as a Sequel of Drug-Induced Gingival Overgrowth: A Case Report Case Rep Dent. 2021;2021():4120148. PMID: 34603800
citations.BibTeX: @article{34603800, title={Necrotizing Ulcerative Gingivitis, a Rare Manifestation as a Sequel of Drug-Induced Gingival Overgrowth: A Case Report}, author={Damdoum M and Varma SR and Jaber MA and Nambiar M}, journal={Case Rep Dent}, volume={2021}, pages={4120148}}

results.title: Pain Management Options in a Patient with Livedoid Vasculopathy and Peripheral Neuropathy
results.journal: Eur J Case Rep Intern Med
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was readmitted twice for @<m>DISEASE_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@pain@@@ crises which were further treated with @CHEMICAL_Epoprostenol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011464 @@@epoprostenol@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ along with @CHEMICAL_Steroids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013256 @@@steroids@@@ to reduce @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@ initially, and finally ketamine infusion with transcutaneous electrical nerve stimulation which resulted in adequate @<m>DISEASE_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@pain@@@ control.

citations.NLM: Palanisamy N, Chinnappan J, Bachuwa G. Pain Management Options in a Patient with Livedoid Vasculopathy and Peripheral Neuropathy Eur J Case Rep Intern Med. 2023;10(1):003727. PMID: 36819654
citations.BibTeX: @article{36819654, title={Pain Management Options in a Patient with Livedoid Vasculopathy and Peripheral Neuropathy}, author={Palanisamy N and Chinnappan J and Bachuwa G}, journal={Eur J Case Rep Intern Med}, volume={10}, number={1}, pages={003727}}

results.title: Gemcitabine-induced digital ischaemia in a patient with metastatic breast cancer.
results.text_hl: She was treated with @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@aspirin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Heparin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006493 @@@heparin@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, topical @CHEMICAL_Nitroglycerin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005996 @@@nitroglycerin@@@ and analgesics.

citations.NLM: Khan AM, Arjyal L, Shamaileh L, Simon M. Gemcitabine-induced digital ischaemia in a patient with metastatic breast cancer. BMJ Case Rep. 2022 Nov 1;15(11):. PMID: 36319039
citations.BibTeX: @article{36319039, title={Gemcitabine-induced digital ischaemia in a patient with metastatic breast cancer.}, author={Khan AM and Arjyal L and Shamaileh L and Simon M}, journal={BMJ Case Rep}, volume={15}, number={11}}

results.title: Acute coronary syndrome due to coronary vasospasm: a case report.
results.text_hl: Here is a case of a 49-year-old man presented to the emergency department with @<m>DISEASE_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@epigastric pain@@@ and @DISEASE_Nausea @DISEASE_MESH:D009325 @@@nausea@@@ with normal initial electrocardiogram.

citations.NLM: Wang A, Meir J, Malik A, Fishkin T, Dey S, Panza JA, Haidry S. Acute coronary syndrome due to coronary vasospasm: a case report. Future Cardiol. 2024 Sep 4;():1-6. PMID: 39229652

results.title: Amlodipine and celecoxib for treatment of hypertension and osteoarthritis pain.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Celecoxib @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068579 @@@celecoxib@@@ for treatment of @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@osteoarthritis pain@@@.

results.title: Cardiovascular drugs in human mechanical nociception: digoxin, amlodipine, propranolol, pindolol and atenolol.
results.text_hl: The calcium channel blocker @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ showed lower @<m>DISEASE_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@pain@@@ scores (-50.6%; P = 0.0000003) than beta-receptor blockers (P = 0.0000003).

citations.NLM: Del Giaccio A, Eblen-Zajjur A. Cardiovascular drugs in human mechanical nociception: digoxin, amlodipine, propranolol, pindolol and atenolol. Invest Clin. 2010 Mar;51(1):77-86. PMID: 20815158
citations.BibTeX: @article{20815158, title={Cardiovascular drugs in human mechanical nociception: digoxin, amlodipine, propranolol, pindolol and atenolol.}, author={Del Giaccio A and Eblen-Zajjur A}, journal={Invest Clin}, volume={51}, number={1}, pages={77-86}}
